channel.title: The Wanderer on Arkiwaal
channel.description: Recent content in The Wanderer on Arkiwaal

item.title: Classes
item.description: Classes: Choose Your Path Today, I want to introduce you to something that I’ve been working on: Class Paths. This is an initiative designed to gamify the learning process, enhance immersion and make your journey here at Arkiwaal more engaging. Everyone learns in their own unique way. That’s why I came up with three distinct classes (for now) that you can choose from (you may choose instead to be matched to a class), each with its own strengths and unique style.
